text: darn those east coast hours; this Friday I'll pop some in :slightly_smiling_face:

Happy Monday! This new-to-coding user is having some trouble with her menu styling in her template. If anyone has any suggestions to get her started on the right foot, that would be much appreciated! <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/Content-Design-Questions/Menu-alignment-Help/m-p/215921/highlight/false#M9584>
Also <@UD53A9UUR> I will mark my calendar to post some threads in here next Friday before I log off! Thank you for the feedback! :slightly_smiling_face:

Would be a 2 min answer if there was a preview link :disappointed:
I'm not familiar with the submission process but do you encourage adding preview links?
Always, Its a common response (at least from me) to always ask for a preview link by directing them how to get one.

:disappointed: I know i put in the request for one so :hand_with_index_and_middle_fingers_crossed: she comes back with one

As for whether we request them, at the moment there aren't any guidelines for submissions, but it is something we are considering especially for these designer/developer of questions. If you have a wish list of things you'd like to see suggested, I'm all ears!
We have them in the ideas forum when creating a new idea so you can see what it would look like/the styling: <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/forums/postpage/board-id/HubSpot_Ideas>
